column2: evb, 55-64 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Caregiver)
column9: My husband was given this prescription in April and we paid $25 for it.  The company Activas has since boosted the price to $270.  Outrageous.  Called the doctor who said try vinegar and hydrocortisone.  This is complete abuse of the regulatory system.  Ask your doctor for another solution.  Don't support this predatory behavior by Activas.

column1: Outer Ear Inflammation caused by Allergy or Infection
column9: This drug is made up of vinegar and hydrocortisone and has been around for years.It is currently being sold at twice the cost of newer drops like floxin and ciprodex.  vinegar and water irrigation can work as well.  Paying over $25 for this drop is ridiculous and charges are between $180 and $260!  Don't be an idiot and use this drug
